mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT n.id AS id, n.noticeboard_istop, n.admin_id AS admin_id, a.admin_login_id, a.admin_name, n.noticeboard_title, n.noticeboard_content, n.noticeboard_date, n.noticeboard_update_date, n.noticeboard_file_name, n.noticeboard_hit FROM noticeboard n JOIN admin a ON n.admin_id = a.id ORDER BY n.noticeboard_istop DESC, n.noticeboard_date DESC, n.id ASC ) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

select * from noticeboard where
noticeboard_title like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' or noticeboard_content like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
${search} like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeboard VALUES (NOTICEBOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{noticeboard_istop}, #{admin_id}, #{noticeboard_title}, #{noticeboard_content}, sysdate, sysdate, #{noticeboard_file_name}, 0)
mapper.select: select * from noticeboard where id = (select prev_id from (select id,noticeboard_title, lead(id,1,-1) over(ORDER BY noticeboard_istop DESC, id desc) as prev_id from noticeboard) where id = #{id})
select * from noticeboard where id = (select next_id from (select id,noticeboard_title, lag(id,1,-1) over(ORDER BY noticeboard_istop DESC, id desc) as next_id from noticeboard) where id = #{id})
mapper.update: update noticeboard set noticeboard_hit = noticeboard_hit + 1 where id = #{id}

UPDATE noticeboard SET noticeboard_istop = #{noticeboard_istop}, noticeboard_title = #{noticeboard_title}, noticeboard_content = #{noticeboard_content}, noticeboard_update_date = sysdate, noticeboard_file_name = #{noticeboard_file_name} WHERE id = #{id}
